DOC.brief_summary: As increasing tidal volume, the cross sectional area and circumference of Internal Jugular Vein (IJV) could increase. And In the previous study, Trendelenburg position can increase size of IJV. So investigators would compare the cross sectional area, circumference of IJV and peak airway pressure in neutral and Trendelenburg position
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Increased Tidal Volume on Internal Jugular Vein Cross-sectional Area
DOC.criteria: patients who are undergoing general anesthesia history of IJV cannulation uncontrolled cardiovascular disease severe pulmonary problem cervical spinal impairment
DOC.keyword: any operation that required for general anesthesia
